name: NIKHOJ
description:
#INDIEGAME

  ( নিখোঁজ/निखोज ) 

A first person psychology horror game that will bring chills down your spine.A  game based upon a fictional story from bengali culture.You are an professor who  took his intrest on finding the mystery on an abandon school where rumors are spreading about this haunted place, those who entered were never seen again .But you came here to prove it wrong! Also for your sister's sake! Explore the abandon house  and solve the mystery to find the truth.If you can?

Explore the old abandon school created in the 18th century by the british officials. Interact or observe the creations that will open a new path to the story. Search and explore to solve the mystery or become a part of the mystery. All depends upon your choice. Don't let it go to waste!

FOR BEST EXPERIENCE 
  • Use headphones 
  • Play alone
  • Play at midnight or at night. 
CONTROLS Forward    W            Backward      S                  Left     A                Right     D               Interact      E                Pause     Esc              Drag object    LMB               Flashlight       Q SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Minimum :

  • OS-Windows xp, Windows7 32bit or 64bit
  • Ram-3GB
  • Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT 256MB graphics card or better, ATI Radeon X1900 256MB graphics card or better
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Free Disk Space: 1.5GB

Maximum :

  • OS-Windows 10, Windows7 32bit or 64bit
  • Ram-4GB
  • Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT 512MB graphics card or better, ATI Radeon HD 4830 512MB graphics card or better
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Free Disk Space: 1.5GB
